title: Removal of Accused Persons Act, 1973
description: Official consolidated text of Removal of Accused Persons Act, 1973 (LXIII of 1973) published by The Pakistan Code (Criminal Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, extent and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Removal of
Accused Persons Act, 1973.
(2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan.
(3) it shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Removal of prisoners, etc
provisions.content:
Notwithstanding anything contained in any other law for
the time being in force, the Federal Government may, by general or special order, provide for
the removal of any accused person or class of accused persons held in custody in any Province to
any other Province to be held in custody therein.
